text: Euphorbia melanocarpa is a species of flowering plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to Ecuador and Peru. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== melanocarpa Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of Peru Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier
title: Euphorbia melanocarpa
